title: 4.4 Master Challenge 2
question: Prepare a slide using the Comparison layout as shown below. Now, copy the content for square to the rectangle and modify the formula of perimeter and area. Also, use the Change Shape tool to change the square to a rectangle. Apply design ideas and effects to make your presentation attractive.
